bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with cun lie 皴裂 , chapped skin cracks. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry zhe gu 鷓 鴣 quoting Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 : 膏手可以已瘒瘃，令不龜裂 , “The ointment is able to end chapped skin cracks on the hands lest turtle [shell] cracks should develop”, writes: 塗手皸瘃，令不龜裂 , “When hands with chapped skin and chilblain are washed with it it will prevent the emergence of turtle [shell] cracks”.
